title:
BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel W/ Cover, 4.2 ft. x 4 ft. x 4.4 ft, indoors and outdoors,  galvanized metal iron thick wire tube fences, rust-resistance, no sharp edges, waterproof cover,
protect dog from the hot sun,  small and large size available, also for: chicken, rabbit, duck.
descriptions:
Introducing the BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel with Cover! This versatile playpen is perfect for both indoor and outdoor use, providing a secure and spacious area for your furry friends to play and relax.

With dimensions of 4.2ft in width, 4.0ft in length, and 4.4ft in height, this playpen offers ample space for dogs, chickens, rabbits, and ducks to roam around comfortably. The playpen is made of sturdy galvanized metal iron, ensuring durability and rust resistance. The paint-coated finish adds an extra layer of protection, and there are no sharp edges to worry about, making it safe for your pets.

The playpen comes with a 210D oxford cloth cover, which is waterproof, windproof, and weatherproof. It also provides a sunshade to protect your pets from harsh sunlight. Whether it's rain or shine, your pets will be comfortably sheltered in this playpen.

For added security, the playpen features a solid latching swing gate with strong latches. You can have peace of mind knowing that your pets will remain safe and secure inside. The playpen also offers excellent ventilation, ensuring a fresh and airy environment for your pets.

Available in both small and large sizes, you can choose the perfect playpen to accommodate your pets' needs. The installation is a breeze, thanks to the easy-to-install panels. You'll have the playpen set up in no time, providing a safe and enjoyable space for your pets to play and exercise.

Don't miss out on this BingoPaw Playpen Welded Wire Dog Kennel with Cover. Give your pets the freedom and security they deserve. Order now and create a comfortable haven for your beloved pets!
